techmeme.title: Sources: Indian investment app Groww plans to file for an IPO within 10-12 months, seeking a $6B-$8B valuation; Groww was last valued at $3B in October 2021 (Manish Singh/TechCrunch)
Starlink has disrupted Kenya's existing ISP industry since its launch in July 2023, forcing legacy providers to lower prices and increase internet speeds (Rest of World)
Global smartphone shipments grew 4% YoY in 2024 after a decade-low in 2023; top two brands, Samsung and Apple, were mostly flat, while Xiaomi grew 12% YoY (Counterpoint Research)
The UK PM debuts plans to increase its public sector compute by over 20x to spark a "national renewal", saying the UK doesn't need to walk a US or EU path on AI (Keir Starmer/Financial Times)
Microsoft notifies customers in Australia, New Zealand, Malaysia, Singapore, Taiwan, and Thailand of upcoming ~30% to ~45% price hikes for Microsoft 365 plans (Simon Sharwood/The Register)
